prompt: Create an interactive Mandelbrot set explorer using HTML5 Canvas. Build a fractal visualization that allows deep zoom exploration of the Mandelbrot set. Make it as feature-rich and beautiful as you can - consider adding zoom/pan controls, color palettes, iteration controls, coordinate display, smooth rendering, other fractal sets (Julia, Burning Ship), or any features that would make exploring fractals captivating. Create something that showcases the infinite complexity of fractals.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating mathematical visualizations and fractal generators. Build the best fractal explorer you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement Mandelbrot set rendering with zoom/pan capabilities. Evaluated on mathematical correctness, visual quality, and exploration features.

prompt: Create an audio visualizer using HTML5 Canvas and Web Audio API. Build a real-time visualization that reacts to music or audio input. Make it as impressive as you can - consider adding multiple visualization modes (frequency bars, waveforms, particles, circular, 3D), color schemes, smoothing, audio file support, microphone input, or creative visual effects. Create something visually stunning that truly brings audio to life.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating audio-reactive visualizations with Web Audio API. Build the most impressive visualizer you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement Web Audio API with audio-reactive visualization. Evaluated on visual creativity, responsiveness to audio, and technical implementation.

prompt: Create a ray tracer using HTML5 Canvas (or Python). Implement a renderer that creates photorealistic 3D scenes using ray tracing. Make it as advanced as you can - consider adding reflections, refractions, multiple light sources, different materials, shadows, anti-aliasing, or adjustable camera/scene parameters. Create a scene that demonstrates realistic 3D rendering.
system_prompt: You are an expert at computer graphics and ray tracing algorithms. Build the best ray tracer you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement ray tracing with lighting and shadows. Evaluated on rendering quality, features, and realism.

Create something that makes exploring cellular automata engaging and educational.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating cellular automata simulations. Build the best Game of Life you can.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement Game of Life rules correctly with interactive controls. Evaluated on correctness, UI quality, and features.

prompt: Create a path tracer (not just ray tracer) that renders a 3D scene with realistic global illumination. Implement materials, lights, and monte carlo sampling for indirect lighting. Use Python or any language you prefer. Make the output as photorealistic as you can - add features like area lights, different materials (diffuse, reflective, glass), depth of field, or other effects. The scene should demonstrate soft shadows, color bleeding, and realistic lighting.
system_prompt: You are an expert in computer graphics and rendering algorithms. Build a real path tracer.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement path tracing with global illumination, not just ray tracing. Evaluated on correctness, visual quality, and features.

prompt: Create a music tracker/sequencer (like old-school MOD trackers) in HTML or Python. Let users create music by placing notes in a grid, with multiple instruments/channels. Implement playback, sound synthesis, and pattern editing. Make it as feature-rich as you can - consider adding different waveforms, effects (reverb, delay), tempo control, or the ability to export audio. Draw inspiration from trackers like FastTracker or modern tools like Beepbox.
system_prompt: You are an expert at creating music software and audio synthesis tools.
evaluation_criteria: Must implement pattern sequencing, sound synthesis, and playback. Evaluated on functionality, sound quality, and creative features.
